RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 72. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATHENAIS broke with the leaders, allowed the two leaders to go while under firm restraint toward the inside, continued to rate into the far turn, covered up early in that bend, crept closer along the rail soon after, was not making progress on the winner nearing midstretch when switched out, late bid outside, fully extended to prove best. SURREY showed the way early along the inside, dueled the middle half while headed late backstretch, regained the advantage and disposed of the other speed turning into the straight, clear a furlong out, responded when confronted by the winner late and proved stubborn to the end. LA VILLANA settled in mid pack along the inside, shuffled back while saving ground far turn, continued along the inside, rallied up the rail to garner the show, no real threat to the top two. IM SINGLED UP pressed early off the inside, dueled the middle part, led, no match for the top pair in the stretch, caught late for the show. SHE'S WAYNE'S went one paced while racing off the inside, lacked a closing kick. CAPELLA RED bothered to be last away, continued to trail for five furlongs, began to better her position late in the final turn, four wide into the lane, continued to improve without posing a serious threat. DIVERGENCE settled off the pace toward the inside, bettered herself the middle half then flattened out through the lane while remaining inside. LIGHTENING MO in the second flight early, was finished after a half. ARTIE'S DEAL broke back, moved out to be five wide into the first turn, was never involved in remaining back. HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Artie's Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 5w into first turn, never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Divergence
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, bettered middle half, flattened out drive

ENTRY.NAME: Athenais
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with leaders,firmly rated inside,switchd out,fully extended

ENTRY.NAME: La Villana
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in mid pack, shuffled rail 3/8, rallied show rail

ENTRY.NAME: Surrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed way early inside, dueled, headed, shook clear,stubborn

ENTRY.NAME: Lightening Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, finished after half

ENTRY.NAME: Capella Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, bother, trailed, belatedly to improve position

ENTRY.NAME: She's Wayne's
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced off the inside, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Im Singled Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early outside, dueled middle half, led, caught 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 9, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 9, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: J Z'S FIRST took back after breaking with the leaders, tracked a soft pace inside, continued to save ground second turn, cut the corner to move closer turning for home, rail bid past the furlong marker, late duel, proved narrowly best under firm handling. LAKE RUNNER prompted the pace from the outside while three wide, continued to lurk outside in the run up the backstretch, challenged on the outside midway on the final turn, put a head in front nearing the furlong grounds, dueled late outside the winner, held on gamely to miss. HERE COMES LOVIE in the second flight early toward the inside, moved out for the drive, slowly gaining late while widest of the lead flight at the wire. SHE'S MY PRIORITY away in good order, pressed the issue between horses, dueled into the lane, weakened the final furlong. LAURIEANN narrowly set a soft pace while toward the inside, gave way entering the stretch after allowing the winner the rail. COLD HEARTED WENCH in the second flight while four wide, continued outside up the backstretch, four wide once again through the second bend, came up empty for the stretch run. LACIS JEWEL last away, trailed throughout in failing to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Laurieann
ENTRY.COMMENT: narrowly set pace inside, gave way entering stretch

ENTRY.NAME: J Z's First
ENTRY.COMMENT: took back after break, rail trip, cut the corner, late duel, best

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Lovie
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight toward rail, moved out, slow gain late outside

ENTRY.NAME: She's My Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between horses, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Cold Hearted Wench
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight 4w, came up empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Lacis Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Runner
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3w, bid 2nd turn, took over, dueled late, game

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLAY MASTER broke alertly, set or forced the pace up the backstretch three wide, continued to vie in the three path while between horses turn, extended duel through the lane inside the runner up, proved narrowly best in determined fashion. ONE MORE SLEEP never far back well out in the strip, ranged up closer to press four wide through the turn, hooked up with the winner outside that one for a duel the length of the stretch, outkicked late, clearly second best. CALL ME FIREY broke in to be last away, trailed behind the lead flight inside, shifted out for the drive, gained the nod for the show late, not a threat to the top pair. CHILI RED with the pace for a half along the inside, in a bit tight, shuffled back along the rail late in the turn, went evenly through the lane to miss the show. ASTERN BANKER forwardly placed while widest, five wide through the turn when pressing the issue, weakened through the lane. ADMIRAL AFLEET away well, vied for five furlongs while between foes, backed up through the lane. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF ONE MORE SLEEP AGAINST THE WINNER FOR AN ALLEGED WHIP STRIKE EXITING THE TURN WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: Call Me Firey
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, last away, lacked speed inside, shifted out, nod show

ENTRY.NAME: Chili Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace inside, bit tight, shuffled 1/4,missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Admiral Afleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between foes, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Play Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, set or forced pace 3w, extended duel, determined

ENTRY.NAME: One More Sleep
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closer 4w turn btwn foes,stretch duel, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Astern Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, pressed 5w turn, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 7 1/2F Turf CR: 68. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOOD RIVER settled off the pace and the inside, unhurried into the far turn three wide, covered up in some traffic with a quarter to run, came four wide and clear into the lane, set down, late bid outside the leader, proved narrowly best. LITTLE ROCKY in the second flight inside, inched closer through the second turn, rail bid nearing the furlong grounds, took over, shook clear, came out, responded when the winner came alongside in the waning strides, missed. MY LIL DUDE broke in, was straightened to track in the second flight off the inside, mild challenge a furlong out, lacked a closing punch to finish up best of the rest. RUN ON ACES four wide in the first turn when with the main body, continued outside, four wide into the second bend, floated out five wide by the winner into the stretch, finished up evenly while improving position a bit. MO CREDO raced in the second flight toward the inside early, remained in the second flight while between horses and outside the runner up into the far turn, lacked a serious closing response. CAJUN CARLOS narrowly set the pace toward the inside, in the two path while showing the say into the lane, allowed the runner the inside when straightened for home then began to weaken when headed by that rival. MY PAL SWEET broke in to tighten up PUTTHEHAMMERDOWN, raced four wide when moving to press the issue into the first turn, continued to force the issue up front in the run up the backstretch, faltered in the drive. WHEELS TURNING void of speed, fanned six wide into the lane, remained back in failing to menace. UNITEDAPPEAL broke back, lacked speed, angled five wide into the lane, failed to muster a rally. PUTTHEHAMMERDOWN bobbled then took up when in tight, remained back and was never a threat. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF PUTTHEHAMMERDOWN AGAINST MY LIL DUDE FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE START WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Rocky
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside,slipped thru rail,clear,came out,responded,miss

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Carlos
ENTRY.COMMENT: narrowly set pace toward rail, faltered final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Wheels Turning
ENTRY.COMMENT: back, fanned 6w 1/4, remained back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Unitedappeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 5w 1/4, did not threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Credo
ENTRY.OWNER: Thompson Racing LLC (Stephen Thompson) and OM Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside, lacked response drive

ENTRY.NAME: Wood River
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace and rail, 3w,traffic 1/4, 4w into lane, late bid

ENTRY.NAME: Putthehammerdown
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, tight, took up start, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: My Pal Sweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, 4w into first, pressed outside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: My Lil Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, tracked 2nd flight, lacked winning kick

ENTRY.NAME: Run On Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w first turn, continued outside, 4-5w 2nd, improved bit

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARLOS' BLAST away in good order, stalked the leader from the second flight in the run up the backstretch, continued to pursue that rival through the turn, engaged that same foe from the outside past the furlong marker and wore him down under firm handling. MR. SNOWFLAKE broke on top, soon sprinted clear, in hand through the turn when rating, responded when challenged past the furlong marker, proved stubborn to the wire, well clear of the others. SABERMAN stumbled at the start, raced back and inside for a half, two path into the lane, rallied between horses to be up for the show, no threat to the top pair. ST JOE closest to the runner up in the run up the backstretch, evenly through the turn and into the lane, lacked a closing punch,nipped at the wire for the show. SASSI ASPEN shuffled back break, trailed in lacking speed, saved ground through the turn, improved slightly while never dangerous. IDE LIKE HAWAII outrun while racing outside. AMAZING AMERICAN in the second flight early, backed up down the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Saberman
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, back inside, rallied btwn, just up show

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Snowflake
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, soon clear, in hand turn, responded, stubborn

ENTRY.NAME: Sassi Aspen
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back brk, saved ground, improved slightly

ENTRY.NAME: St Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, evenly drive,nipped 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Amazing American
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Carlos' Blast
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, bid, wore down foe late

ENTRY.NAME: Ide Like Hawaii
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back while racing outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOTTATAKEHIMTO broke back, unhurried out of the chute and up the backstretch, closer from between horses turn, dropped inside, rail bid into the lane, kicked clear, ridden out. ITELLYOUTHEFACTS dueled up front closest to but not on the rail, pulled away a bit from the other speed early in the turn, allowed the winner the inside entering the stretch, briefly raced on equal terms with that one then proved no match the final furlong, held sway for the place. MR ELVIN within striking distance off the inside, four wide into the lane, slowly gaining on the runner up late. JOEY'S LIGHTENING settled off the pace, saved ground turn, went evenly through the lane in lacking a serious closing punch. BAQUERO'S BIND broke outward, moved up to duel in the three path outside the runner up, began to give way in the turn. CIGAR VAN last away, trailed throughout in showing little.

ENTRY.NAME: Itellyouthefacts
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, larger lead 2p, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Joey's Lightening
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, saved ground no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Cigar Van
ENTRY.OWNER: Pitzer Renee and Berggren Wayne J
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Gottatakehimto
ENTRY.OWNER: Batiste Lionel Jr and Hebert Brandon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, unhurried, advanced turn, rail bid, clear, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Baquero's Bind
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3p, gave way turn

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Elvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, evenly drive, slowly gaining second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 91. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 9, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A R ace Since April 9, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDIMAAJ came out early to tighten up outer rivals, moved out further to race closest to the leader in the three path, continued to stalk that rival into the far turn, was still chasing when stalling upper stretch, late push to be up in time. STEPHEN'S ANSWER broke well from the outside, moved up to take control early in the first turn in the three path, angled in a bit onto the backstretch, continued to set the pace, garnered a larger advantage into and through upper stretch, faltered late to be run down by the winner, saved the place. SMOKY TOPAZ broke sharp, fell back off the pace while four wide into the first turn, second flight middle half, asked three wide into the lane, getting to the runner up late outside. BAYOU JAM lacked speed while racing outside, four wide turning for home, improved position with some mild interest down the lane. SERMONONTHEMOUNT went one paced while racing just off the inside. ARCTIC ROSE floated out early when racing toward the front, second flight for five furlongs and began to give way. RUN ROCKET in tight, steadied early, saved ground to no avail. PAYDAY TOO off slow then steadied to trail early, continued to lag, came five wide into the stretch, failed to muster a rally. TIME TO MOVE five wide into the first turn, raced outside and tired after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Indimaaj
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out early, stalked outside, stalled 1/8, late push

ENTRY.NAME: Arctic Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: floated out early, 2nd flight, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Payday Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, steadied, 5w into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Run Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight, steadied early, saved ground no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Sermononthemount
ENTRY.COMMENT: went one paced off the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Jam
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, outside, 4w into lane, mild interest

ENTRY.NAME: Smoky Topaz
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, fell back off the pace 4w, settled, gaining 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Stephen's Answer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, took over 3w into 1st turn, pace, larger led,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Time to Move
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w into first turn, outside, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 9, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN PALACE away in good order, fell back a bit soon after, closer four wide through the turn, vied between foes past the furlong marker, proved best under firm handling. AUTUMNS STRONG MAN broke alertly, with the leaders backstretch, continued to contest the issue while between horses turn, closest to the inside of the leaders past the midstretch point, outkicked by the winner late, clear for the place. ALTERANA last to leave, joined the first flight into the turn widest, five path through the bend, remained with striking distance past the furlong marker, no late punch to finish up best of the rest. DOUBLE BARREL MAN fell back to trail after the break, could still see them all through the turn, picked off a couple of tiring rivals with some mild late interest. EASY RUNNER with the early pace along the inside, weakened through the lane. NOSY BANKER vied early in the two path, gave way from between foes turning for home.

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the early pace inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Nosy Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early, gave way late turn between foes

ENTRY.NAME: Autumns Strong Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, with the pace, narrow advantage, outkicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: Double Barrel Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, picked off couple of tiring rivals,mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Alterana
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, closer into turn, 5w thru bend, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, closer 4w turn, btwn foes 1/8, proved best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALL AMERICAN PAT broke running, cleared toward the inside before a quarter, set all the pace, drew off through the lane under steady handling. MINT JULIUS lacked early foot off the inside three wide into the turn, angled out to be six wide exiting, late run down the middle of the strip to finish up willingly. GRACE'S SOLDIER broke back, moved up in traffic backstretch, went evenly through the lane, caught late for the place. SUM CHARM broke out to soundly bump with SEEMYMVALENTIVE, was straightened to be forwardly placed while racing three wide, remained within striking distance turn, lacked a closing kick. SWEETHEART VISION turned in an even effort while racing in the two path. CHARMING KAT in mid pack off rail, three wide into the lane, not dangerous to the wire. SHEEZA PRIORITY pinched then checked up at the break to fall far back, continued to trail by a large margin turn, showed some belated interest to improve position the final furlong. SEEMYVALENTINE soundly bumped at the break, four to five wide turn, went evenly through the stretch. SWAMP ROCK chased the winner early, gave way turning for home. DREAMED I AM FAST was never factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamed I Am Fast
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetheart Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: even effort two path

ENTRY.NAME: Charming Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack 3w, not dangerous stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved up in traffic, evenly drive, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: All American Pat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke running, cleared toward inside, all the pace, drew out

ENTRY.NAME: Swamp Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Mint Julius
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, angled 6w into lane, late run midtrack

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bump, forwardly placed 3w, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Sheeza Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched, checked up, far back, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Seemyvalentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: sound bump break, 4-5w turn, even stretch
